title: Paytm Bank, auditor lock horns over business viability
description: Paytm Payments Bank faces audit qualification disputes over viability, seeking RBI intervention. Compliance issues led to operational restrictions, prompting directions to transfer businesses. KYC guideline non-compliance has halted income generation and eroded net worth.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
